    Privacy by Design

    Built from the ground up to protect your data. We remove friction so you can focus on sharing securely.

    Zero Tracking

    No analytics, no cookies, no tracking pixels. What you share is your business.

    No Data Selling

    We don't monetize your data. The product is the encryption, not the user.

    No Ads

    A clean, distraction-free interface focused purely on secure file transfer.

    No Account Required

    Skip the signup forms. Upload and share instantly without giving up personal info.

    Radically Simple

    Secure sharing shouldn't require a manual.

    01

    Upload your file

    Drag and drop any file up to 500MB directly into your browser.

    02

    We encrypt it

    Files are encrypted locally using AES-256 before upload. We never see the key.

    03

    Share instantly

    Copy the secure link and send it. Set it to self-destruct after downloading.

    Privacy by Architecture

    VaultBridge is built around privacy. Traditional cloud platforms are built around retention and monetization.

    Privacy Optimized

    VaultBridge

    Privacy-First by Design

    • No account required
    • Zero tracking policy
    • Auto-destruct links built-in
    • Temporary encrypted vaults
    • Ad-free experience
    • Instant sharing
    • No data monetization
    • Minimal data retention

    Traditional Cloud

    Built for Data Ecosystems

    • –Account mandatory
    • –Usage analytics enabled
    • –Limited self-destruct options
    • –Designed for permanent storage
    • –Monetization-driven
    • –Login-gated sharing
    • –Data retention by default

    "VaultBridge is designed to disappear when your file does.
    Traditional cloud is designed to keep your data forever."

    Built for: PrivacyvsBuilt for: Platform Growth
    Model: Not user datavsModel: Engagement metrics
    Lifecycle: TemporaryvsLifecycle: Permanent

    "Used by developers, students, and privacy-focused users worldwide to share sensitive data without leaving a trace."
